mainObjective: Investigate the mysterious disappearances in Harrow’s Hollow and discover the fate of Scout Elen.

plotPoints.title: Shadows Over Harrow’s Hollow
plotPoints.description: The party arrives in Harrow’s Hollow, a small, anxious village gripped by fear. Elder Mirna Harrow asks the characters to investigate recent disappearances, including that of Scout Elen. Tensions run high as rumors of curses, spirits, and the haunted Keep of Doom swirl among the villagers. Players must gather information, win trust, and follow leads to piece together the mystery.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Norn arrives in Harrow’s Hollow and is asked by Elder Mirna to investigate the disappearances, including Scout Elen. The investigation can begin with questioning villagers or searching for clues.

sideQuests.title: Superstition and Shadows
sideQuests.description: Old Tommen believes a wandering spirit haunts the village. If the party investigates, they may encounter the Wandering Shade—a restless ghost whose cryptic words offer hints about the keep and the missing villagers.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Communicating with the spirit yields crucial information or warnings.

sideQuests.title: Trouble at the Hearth
sideQuests.description: Cira the Innkeeper’s cellar is plagued by minor poltergeist activity. Calming the spirit earns Cira’s gratitude and a helpful clue about Scout Elen’s last known movements.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides a clue to Elen's disappearance and a possible safe haven.

plotPoints.title: The Road to Doom
plotPoints.description: Tracking clues and rumors, the party must brave the haunted forest and reach the Keep of Doom. Along the way, they navigate treacherous terrain, spectral ambushes, and lingering wards. The forest is alive with unnatural energies, and the party may encounter allies or enemies who help or hinder their journey.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Norn leaves the safety of Harrow’s Hollow for the Witchlight Trailhead, beginning the search for Scout Elen and advancing the investigation toward the Keep of Doom.

sideQuests.title: Lost in the Dark
sideQuests.description: The party finds evidence of a wounded villager (Scout Elen’s trail) and can choose to follow it. This detour leads to an encounter with hostile forest spirits and potentially the rescue of Scout Elen.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Rescuing Elen provides valuable information and closes a key investigation thread.

sideQuests.title: Circle of the Wild Heart
sideQuests.description: The party may encounter Druidess Halwen or Feyfriend Lirael, who offer cryptic warnings or aid against the keep’s curse—if the party helps drive off a corrupted beast menacing the woods.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Gaining the druids’ favor offers magical assistance or knowledge about the Keep’s defenses.

plotPoints.title: Secrets of the Keep
plotPoints.description: The party explores the haunted Keep of Doom, contending with deadly traps, cursed guardians, and echoes of the past. Here they may meet Sir Garran Vael, a cursed knight bound to the relic’s will, and the Spectral Scribe, who reveals the Keep’s tragic history. The party must uncover the truth behind the Shadow Relic and decide how to handle its corrupting power.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Unraveling the Keep’s secrets determines how the party can confront the Shadow Relic and whether they can free the cursed knight or fall under the Keep’s shadow themselves.

sideQuests.title: The Knight’s Redemption
sideQuests.description: Sir Garran Vael begs for release from his curse. The party may try to free his spirit (through battle, persuasion, or a ritual), gaining a powerful ally or vital lore for the final confrontation.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Freeing Sir Garran can provide assistance or a safe passage; failure could make him an enemy.

sideQuests.title: The Scribe’s Ledger
sideQuests.description: The Spectral Scribe offers to share the Keep’s history if the party can recover lost pages scattered in dangerous parts of the keep.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Assembling the ledger reveals the true nature of the Shadow Relic and hints at how to defeat or contain it.

plotPoints.title: Confrontation with the Shadow Relic
plotPoints.description: In the heart of the keep, the party confronts the Shadow Relic—a sentient, malevolent artifact whose whispers have corrupted the land. Players must make crucial choices: destroy it, attempt to contain its power, or risk bargaining with its intelligence. Their decisions will affect the fate of Harrow’s Hollow and may draw the attention of the Black Banner, a sinister cult seeking the relic for their own ends.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The party’s resolution determines the future of the region: peace and healing, new threats, or further corruption. May also set up future adventures if the Black Banner becomes involved.

sideQuests.title: Agents in the Shadows
sideQuests.description: Optional: The party may discover members of the Black Banner already infiltrating the keep, setting up a future antagonist if not dealt with now.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Defeating or negotiating with the cultists may provide information about larger threats and shape future plot hooks.
